title: In-app Publishing/Share section with copyable public URL (ICP-only)

requirements.summary: Add a main-UI-accessible “Publishing / Share” section explaining ICP hosting and showing a copy-to-clipboard public URL with confirmation.
acceptanceCriteria: A user can find a “Publishing / Share” section from the main UI (e.g., footer link, header menu item, or a simple settings/about page).
The section contains English text stating that publishing/deployment is to the Internet Computer and that Google hosting is not supported in this project.
The section displays the current public URL (window.location.origin) and includes a “Copy link” button.
Clicking “Copy link” copies the URL to the clipboard and shows a success toast (or equivalent non-intrusive confirmation).

file_operations.description: Create a dedicated “Publishing / Share” page that: (1) explains the app is published as a web app on the Internet Computer (ICP) and that Google hosting is not supported, (2) reads and displays the current public URL using window.location.origin, and (3) provides a one-click “Copy link” action using the browser clipboard API with a success confirmation using the existing toast system (sonner). Use shadcn/ui components (e.g., Card, Button) for layout and actions; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Register and wire a new route (e.g., /publishing) to PublishingSharePage so it is navigable within the app. Ensure the route is added to the route tree. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a visible link in the main UI (footer is preferred to keep nav minimal) labeled “Publishing / Share” that navigates to the new PublishingSharePage route. Keep it consistent with existing TanStack Router Link usage. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Ensure newly added publishing-related UI copy is clear English and explicitly avoids implying Google deployment options exist.
acceptanceCriteria: No new UI copy suggests the app can be deployed to Google Cloud / Google Play.
All newly added user-facing strings are in English.

file_operations.description: Review and refine all user-facing strings in the Publishing / Share UI to ensure clear English phrasing, explicitly ICP-focused hosting/deployment guidance, and no implication of Google Cloud/Google Play availability. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the new navigation link label (“Publishing / Share”) and any surrounding footer text added/adjusted is in clear English and does not imply Google deployment. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
